summary: This bill, HR 516, proposes amendments to the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 regarding the railroad track maintenance credit. It seeks to increase the credit amount from $3,500 to $6,100, with provisions for inflation adjustments starting in 2026.  It also modifies the definition of qualified railroad track maintenance expenditures, changing the relevant date from January 1, 2015 to January 1, 2024. The amendments are to apply to expenditures in taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
